name: Cyber Storm Edge
description:
- Game made in one month for the Secret Santa Jam! I hope you like it!  xD

     -Inspired by Suikou's letter from the Jam!
 
     - Has the first Stage and its Boss Fight!   

     - Retro Aesthetics (Art, Music, SFX, Design) 

     - I'll still finish this game! The plan is to complete those 3 remaining stages and add one last boss!     

Credits:

   -Pixel Art, Programming, SFX, OST and Game made by Thiago Avidos. If you want to support me there's also my Ko-fi and Channel. 

  -Game made using the LÖVE framework!
